reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major thrombotic microangiopathies: HUS (1-2 per 100k, primarily pediatric), TTP (0.3-0.5 per 100k), drug-induced TMAs (0.1-0.2 per 100k), and secondary TMAs (0.2-0.5 per 100k) = ~2.5 per 100k globally. Low confidence due to heterogeneous etiologies and variable geographic/demographic distribution.
